data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Troms to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Troms, Norway
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Troms, Norway a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 71,600 people living in the state of Troms.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Troms, Norway to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Norwegian-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, sanctify the 5,700 believers in Troms and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Troms, Norway and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Troms, Norway know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

location.name: Troms
location.people_groups_list: Czech, Thai, Dutch, Arab, Syrian, Bosniak
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Czech (2,200), Thai (21,000), Dutch (5,500), Arab, Syrian (23,000), Bosniak (18,000)
